alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Dodge; Pulaski (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 1:52PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Dodge, central Pulaski and southwestern Bleckley Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 152 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Hartford, or near Hawkinsville, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, nickel sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cochran, Hawkinsville, Dubois, Gresston, Empire, Mobley Crossing, Hartford, Pulaski State Prison, Baileys Park and Ocmulgee Banks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central Georgia.
